subject: AI & Agents
title: Rollback Strategies for Bad Models
description: A short lesson to help you apply Rollback Strategies for Bad Models.

hook.text: The new model went live at noon. By 1 PM, conversion dropped 20%. Roll it backâ€”now.

buildup.text: Rollback means reverting to the previous model version when the new one causes harm.

discovery.text: Blue-green deployment: keep the old model running alongside the new one, switch traffic instantly.

twist.text: Canary deployment: send 5% of traffic to the new model first. If it fails, only 5% is affected.

climax.text: Automated rollback: monitoring detects degradation and reverts without human intervention.

punchline.text: Deploy with confidence. Rollback in seconds.

quiz.question: What is canary deployment?
options: Sending a small percentage of traffic to the new model first
